author: Hadlee Simons
title: Cell C launches Whatsapp bundle
text:
Cell C launches Whatsapp bundle Article By: Hadlee Simons Tue, 01 Sep 2015 5:32 PM Share Your Email WhatsApp's homepage. 
Cell C's free WhatsApp promotion may have expired by September 1, but it quickly brought an alternative option. 
The network officially confirmed a R5 WhatsApp bundle on Tuesday, confirming reports late last week - so what do you get for R5 then? 
Well, Cell C is promising uncapped access to the popular instant messaging platform for 30 days, albeit with a 1GB fair usage policy. 
"Once the 1GB fair usage limit has been reached, you will be charged for usage at your normal standard tariff plan unless you have inclusive data or a data bundle loaded. You will receive an SMS notifying you that you have reached your bundle limit," the mobile network explained. 
"The WhatsApp Bundle wallet will not be consumed for any other data usage outside of WhatsApp. Access to other websites will incur data charges applicable at your normal tariff plan or will deplete from any existing data bundles." 
The bundle is available to post-paid, prepaid and topup customers. 
Cell C added that BlackBerry users not on BlackBerry 10 can't take advantage of the bundle. But in another interesting move, WhatsApp Calling isn't included either. Read More
